00168 /*******************************************************************************
00169  *******************************   DEFINES   ***********************************
00170  ******************************************************************************/
00171 
00173 #define CRYOTIMER_INIT_DEFAULT                                                   \
00174 {                                                                                \
00175   true,                  /* Start counting when init done.                    */ \
00176   false,                 /* Disable CRYOTIMER during debug halt.              */ \
00177   false,                 /* Disable EM4 wakeup.                               */ \
00178   cryotimerOscLFRCO,     /* Select Low Frequency RC Oscillator.               */ \
00179   cryotimerPresc_1,      /* LF Oscillator frequency undivided.                */ \
00180   cryotimerPeriod_4096m, /* Wakeup event after 4096M pre-scaled clock cycles. */ \
00181 }

00194 __STATIC_INLINE void CRYOTIMER_IntClear(uint32_t flags)
00195 {
00196   CRYOTIMER->IFC = flags & _CRYOTIMER_IFC_MASK;
00197 }

00212 }

00214 /***************************************************************************/
00221 __STATIC_INLINE void CRYOTIMER_IntEnable(uint32_t flags)
00222 {
00223   CRYOTIMER->IEN |= (flags & _CRYOTIMER_IEN_MASK);
00224 }
00225 
00226 /***************************************************************************/
00233 __STATIC_INLINE void CRYOTIMER_IntDisable(uint32_t flags)
00234 {
00235   CRYOTIMER->IEN &= ~(flags & _CRYOTIMER_IEN_MASK);
00236 }

00309 {
00310   BUS_RegBitWrite((&CRYOTIMER->EM4WUEN), _CRYOTIMER_EM4WUEN_EM4WU_SHIFT, enable);
